text: Nikodin is a village in Municipality of Prilep, North Macedonia. ==Demographics== According to the 2002 census, the village had a total of 7 inhabitants. Ethnic groups in the village include:Macedonian Census (2002), Book 5 - Total population according to the Ethnic Affiliation, Mother Tongue and Religion, The State Statistical Office, Skopje, 2002, p. 155. *Macedonians 6 *Others 1 ==References== Category:Villages in Prilep Municipality
title: Nikodin
